=======================================================================
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE

Department of the Air Force


Department of the Air Force Scientific Advisory Board; Notice of 
Federal Advisory Committee Meeting

AGENCY: Department of the Air Force Scientific Advisory Board, 
Department of the Air Force.

ACTION: Notice of withdrawal.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

SUMMARY: The previous Department of the Air Force Scientific Advisory 
Board Federal Register Notice, Vol. 90, No. 12154, published on Friday 
March 14, 2025, is hereby withdrawn. The Department of the Air Force 
Scientific Advisory Board Meeting to be held on March 27-28, 2025 is 
cancelled. The Department of the Air Force Scientific Advisory Board 
has been directed to pause all operations for 45 days effective Friday, 
March 7, 2025, Office of the Secretary of Defense memorandum, ``Review 
of Department of Defense Advisory Committees''.

FOR FURTHER INFORMATION CONTACT: Lt Col Steven Ingraham, (240) 470-4566 
(Voice), steven.ingraham@us.af.mil (Email). Mailing address is 1500 
West Perimeter Road, Ste. #3300, Joint Base Andrews, MD 20762. Website: 
https://www.scientificadvisoryboard.af.mil/.

Tommy W. Lee,
Acting Air Force Federal Register Liaison Officer.
[FR Doc. 2025-04999 Filed 3-24-25; 8:45 am]
BILLING CODE 3911-44-P
